chess

Class Chess.King

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Chess.Piece
      • chess.Chess.King
  • Enclosing class:
    Chess

    public static class Chess.King
extends Chess.Piece
    Rook class and King class are the only Pieces to have an additional field to other Pieces. They store a boolean has_moved that is false until they have moved. This boolean is used when a King tries to castle since castling is only allowed when both the King and the Rook have not moved. See Chess.Rook
    Author:
    Jake

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      King(char file, int rank)
      Constructor initializes the piece's name as "K", its file as the input file, its rank as the input rank.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • King

        public King(char file,
            int rank)
        Constructor initializes the piece's name as "K", its file as the input file, its rank as the input rank. A "w" or "b" is added before the name and its white_side value is set when the piece is created in Chess.initialize()
        Parameters:
        file - - the file where the piece was created
        rank - - the rank where the piece was created
